title: Hello, I'm Sebastian Leon
subtitle: Data Science Graduate & Full-Stack Developer
paragraphs: I am an Applied Data Scientist and Full-Stack Developer who blends rigorous engineering with creative problem-solving. Currently dedicated to advancing my education, I bring a strong foundation of experience as Full-stack web developer and Data Scientist/Analyst.

My expertise in Data Science, honed through intensive bootcamp training and dedicated self-study, centers on predictive modeling. I have engineered robust machine learning pipelines (SciKit-learn,  Numpy, XGBoost, TensorFlow ...) to train, evaluate, optimize, and deploy complex models, solving critical problems in the fintech and telecommunications sectors.

In the realm of Data Analytics, I am passionate about transforming raw numbers into clear, actionable narratives. I leverage Power BI as a core dashboarding technology, utilizing it alongside Python libraries like Seaborn and Matplotlib to design intuitive visualizations that reveal key trends.

As a Web Developer, I build systems that drive efficiency. My practical experience is rooted in developing full-stack solutions with Django and Python, where I engineered automated reporting tools and streamlined database ingestion using custom scripts.
